item.description:
Please RSVP!

Agenda:
5:30-6:50 Premeeting - Daytraders Group led by Eric from Vermont
7:00 - 7:10 Announcements and Polls, led by Jeff
7:10 - 7:40 Market Report by Harlan
7:40 - 8:00 Market Commentary led by Fred
8:00 - 8:30 Tips, Tricks & Techniques - led by Jeff
8:30 - 8:40 Break
8:40 - 9:00 Stock Picks led by Chris
9:00 - 9:30 Stock Screens led by Jeff



Harlan's Market Update led by Harlan Rieur
Harlan gives us his live market analysis on market trends. Using StockCharts.com and his own combination of indicators - Bollinger Bands, stochastic RSI, MACD, Williams%, OBV plus his panoply of moving averages. Always a pleasure for everyone!

Market Commentary by Fred Sears
Fred is our resident professional and will give us his take on the market.

Tips, Tricks and Techniques
We're trying something new. Do you have a website that is particulartly useful, a tool that everyone should know about. Here's your chance to Show and Tell. Tell us what we need to know as quickly and consisely as you can (like 2-5 minutes) because we want to get in as many as we can!

Stock Picks led by Chris Jones
Bring your stock picks and we'll analyze them en groupe

Screening Using IBD (TM) Method Criteria led by Jeff Orrik

Jeff will use screens to discover valuable stock tickers. Some will be from the screens that Mike Kinkead uses in his IBD (TM) Method presentation. Other screens will be used to discover stock tickers that work well with other lists. The goal is to find stocks and ETFs at buy points while experimenting with the tools available on Investors.com and using the various talents of everybody in the room.


Our members value discussion highly. We try to pack as much discussion as possible. Expressing ideas and sharing knowledge is paramount to our members.
All levels of expertise are welcome. No question is too simple - as a matter of fact the simplest question often evokes the best discussion!

Newcomers gather at the podium during the 8:00 break to learn about the group. Welcome!

If you talk stocks with someone then bring them with you!

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

Make your own investment decisions! Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Tuesday Meetup
